Hi, I am Kunal. I am a Developer

I specialize in end to end website developing and testing.

See my work

How would i help you

I will try my best to submit your project within a given time frame. But you better let me know a month in advance.

Concepting

I usually do rough designs and present them to the customer. If the customer likes it then I will move on.

Building

At each step I will update the user once I start building the sites. The customer will be informed in everything from logo making to content writing.

Deploying

Once the site is ready, and the client approves the sites, the sites will be deployed.

Supporting

Once the site is deployed, I will continue to support the site for the next 6 months, some kind Includes minor changes and bug fixing.

Your Project details

Building single page website, Multiple page website, full stack application(MERN Stack) end to end

3

Responsive website

I will provide responsive design to your website. So your device will mostly be presented in 3 types of device Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop.

5

Single Page website

There will be 5 sections for single page websites. There will be a contact section with 4 other sections so that the user can contact the owner of the site.

4

Multi Page Website

There will be 4 sections for single page websites. There will also be a contact form page with 3 pages, So that the user can contact the owner of the site.

3

Urgent need

If the customer wants a website on instant basic, i have some pre-made templates or i can build it using bootstrap, but for that too i need 3 days.
